title: Russia's rouble sees big fall as U.S. sanctions bite
text:
Russia's rouble sees big fall as U.S. sanctions bite 5:20pm BST - 01:20 
Russia's rouble experienced its biggest one-day fall for over two years on Monday and stocks in major Russian companies also slid, as investors reacted to a new round of U.S. sanctions targeting some of Russia's biggest tycoons. Kate King reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russia's rouble experienced its biggest one-day fall for over two years on Monday and stocks in major Russian companies also slid, as investors reacted to a new round of U.S. sanctions targeting some of Russia's biggest tycoons.
